name: canva_search_elements
description: Search for design elements (icons, illustrations, photos, graphics) on Canva. Returns up to 15 results with element type, preview image, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="grid"] a, [class*="card"] a, [class*="element-card"], [class*="photo-card"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 15); i++) { const el = items[i]; const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const titleEl = el.querySelector('[class*="title"], [aria-label], [alt]'); const proEl = el.querySelector('[class*="pro"], [class*="premium"]'); const typeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="type"], [class*="category"]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? (titleEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || titleEl.getAttribute('alt') || titleEl.textContent.trim()) : (imgEl ? (imgEl.getAttribute('alt') || '') : ''), type: typeEl ? typeEl.textContent.trim() : '{{element_type}}', is_premium: !!proEl, image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: el.href || '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, element_type: `{{element_type}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract element results
